DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether patients drinking their bowel preparation solution with a straw will have improved tolerability for ingestion of their bowel preparation solution and achieve a higher bowel preparation quality score than patients drinking their bowel preparation solution without a straw.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Use of Straw on Tolerability and Quality of Split Dose 4l-PEG Preparation
DOC.criteria: Patients over 18 y/o scheduled for elective outpatient colonoscopy History of colonic surgery, Contraindication for preparation (PEG solution), History of inflammatory bowel disease
